title: Madoff Customers Must Return $16.9 Million for Falsified Trades
sub_head: Family doesn’t get credit for directing Bernard Madoff to execute legitimate securities trades, judge says
body:
A family that invested with Bernard Madoff must return nearly $16.9 million it collected from his phantom investment business, a federal judge ruled, saying the family shouldn’t be treated differently than other of Mr. Madoff’s Ponzi scheme’s beneficiaries because it directed the fraudster on how to trade on its behalf.
